mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.author, p.password, p.title, p.content, p.view_count AS viewCount, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, c.category_name AS categoryName, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM attachments a WHERE a.post_id = p.id ) AS hasAttachments FROM posts p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
